tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Examinations,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
I have been visiting Dr Sanchi Chabbra for dental treatment for the past nearly one year . I must say that Dr Sanchi is very professional with her work. She makes you very comfortable throughout the treatment and has a very genuine concern for her patient's dental health.

She is a very pleasant doctor and describes the entire procedure in depth with patience and is very accommodative with the appointments and scheduling. The best treatment for the patient is actually practiced in the clinic very ethically at the most reasonable cost feasible. Her clinic in Defence Colony has a very fine ambience and cleanliness.¬†

I must say that being a retired Army Colonel I am entitled to free Dental treatment at Army Dental clinics/ECHS empaneled clinics but still I prefer to undertake Dental treatment from Dr Sanchi because of her professionalism and dedication towards her patients.¬†

I strongly recommend her to anyone looking for good dental care in New Delhi/ NCR. She has excellent staff, like Ms. Kajal at the Reception and good clinical assistant too. Thank you Dr Sanchi Chabbra.¬†

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sanchi is so good with her work. One is made comfortable through out the treatment. Professional ism at the same time combined with genuine concern for your dental health added with the expertise in her area is a rare find now a days. 
What is actually needed and what is best for you is actually practiced in the clinic which has such a good ambience as well as a clean and a comfortable feel. 
I don't think me and my family can go anywhere else, even if we have to travel all the way from Gurgaon. 

A Sure Recommend to all! 

Thank You always Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mom had a fall over her face , her entire denture was in bad  shape . She treated them all with lots and lots of  patience  keeping her age in mind giving her least amount of pain .  

She is available at all times . She is an excellent dentist I have known so far . 

Thank you  doctor

review: Dr Sanchi is amazing, she is very patient and explains everything in detail. Even for follow up questions, she replied to all queries nicely. I got my cleaning done, which was very thorough and nicely done. She even explained me after care very patiently.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Sanchi Chhabra is a god-gifted dental surgeon who, by the dint of her hard work and  long experience, seems to have developed a sixth sense about her patients‚Äô dental issues and can put her finger on their sore spots from the very word ‚Äògo‚Äô..She has a remedy for every problem, and she provides these  remedies with an ease and aplomb, which are hard to come by  among most of the  dentists these days as they tend to prolong the treatment for petty gains, without adequate sensitivity towards their suffering. ‚Ä¶. My problem stands resolved and I am absolutely happy and satisfied with the treatment given .
reply_text: Thank you so much Sir for the kind words of appreciation. Happy to be there for my patients

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I usually don‚Äôt write or share my views but today is different and I m forced to write about ** *********  doctor whose good work should reach to all those in need. She is Dr. Sanchi Chhabra who is a wonderful doctor and a human being. Her approach towards her patients is like a approach towards a close family member. She filled cavity in teeth  in my little 4 year old son with so much love which can not be explained  in words here. She made my son so
much comfortable. I do not remember when I last met a competent doctor like her. I highly recommend her. She is just too good in her Job. Her clinic is of international standards with Crystal clear cleanliness and friendly staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr Sanchi and her admin team were very warm and supportive. The process was super quick, easy and pain free. As I had the appointment with Dr Prashant Nanda the same evening for extraction and implant, I was scared, uncertain of the process recommended and wanted to be sure before I go ahead with it. She explained me the whole process with various x-rays, drawings which helped to make an informed choice. She was also easily accessible over phone for any support and made sure to come in the implant process late in the evening to help settle as I only knew her even though she wasn‚Äôt doing the extraction and implant.
